class ../interface/ev_multi_column_list_row.xmlEV_MULTI_COLUMN_LIST_ROW

FalseINTERACTIVE_LIST [FalseSTRING_32] rename Falsedefault_create as Falseinteractive_list_make redefine ../interface/ev_multi_column_list_row.xml#f_on_item_added_aton_item_added_at, ../interface/ev_multi_column_list_row.xml#f_on_item_removed_aton_item_removed_at, ../interface/ev_multi_column_list_row.xml#f_make_filledmake_filled end

create ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create
create {../interface/ev_multi_column_list_row.xmlEV_MULTI_COLUMN_LIST_ROW} ../interface/ev_multi_column_list_row.xml#f_make_filledmake_filled
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_make_filled../interface/ev_multi_column_list_row.xml#f_make_filledmake_filled (n: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Allocate list with n items. -- (n may be zero for empty list.) -- This list will be full. do ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create file#f_featurePrecursor (n) end
feature {NONE} -- Contract support
f_is_in_default_state../interface/ev_multi_column_list_row.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current in its default state? do Result := ../interface/ev_item.xml#f_is_in_default_statePrecursor {../interface/ev_item.xmlEV_ITEM} and ../interface/ev_deselectable.xml#f_is_in_default_statePrecursor {../interface/ev_deselectable.xmlEV_DESELECTABLE} end
feature -- Element change
f_fill_with_strings_8../interface/ev_multi_column_list_row.xml#f_fill_with_strings_8fill_with_strings_8 (other: FalseCONTAINER [FalseSTRING_8]) obsolete "Use `fill' for Unicode support. [2017-05-31]" -- Fill with as many items of other as possible. -- The representations of other and current structure -- need not be the same. local lin_rep: FalseLINEAR [FalseSTRING_8] l_cursor: FalseCURSOR do lin_rep := other.Falselinear_representation from l_cursor := Falsecursor lin_rep.Falsestart until not Falseextendible or else lin_rep.Falseoff loop Falseextend (lin_rep.Falseitem.Falseas_string_32_conversion) Falsefinish lin_rep.Falseforth end Falsego_to (l_cursor) end

f_implementation../interface/ev_multi_column_list_row.xml#f_implementationimplementation: ../implementation_interface/ev_multi_column_list_row_i.xmlEV_MULTI_COLUMN_LIST_ROW_I -- Responsible for interaction with native graphics toolkit.
feature {../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation

f_on_item_removed_at../interface/ev_multi_column_list_row.xml#f_on_item_removed_aton_item_removed_at (an_item: like Falseitem; item_index: FalseINTEGER_32) -- an_item is about to be removed. do ../interface/ev_multi_column_list_row.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_multi_column_list_row_i.xml#f_on_item_removed_aton_item_removed_at (an_item, item_index) end
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_create_implementation../interface/ev_multi_column_list_row.xml#f_create_implementationcreate_implementation -- See {EV_ANY}.create_implementation. do create {../implementation_gtk/ev_multi_column_list_row_imp.xmlEV_MULTI_COLUMN_LIST_ROW_IMP} ../interface/ev_multi_column_list_row.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_multi_column_list_row_imp.xml#f_makemake Falseinteractive_list_make end
f_new_filled_list../interface/ev_multi_column_list_row.xml#f_new_filled_listnew_filled_list (n: FalseINTEGER_32): like Current -- New list with n elements. do create Result.../interface/ev_multi_column_list_row.xml#f_make_filledmake_filled (n) end
